ARABIC: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We brought out all the muminun who were there
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We evacuated everyone who was a believer there,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then We evacuated there from all the believers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We saved the believers among them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So We removed the people who had faith, from that town.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So We brought out from therein the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We brought forth such as were therein of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We brought forth such believers as were in it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then we brought forth such believers as were there.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We saved all the faithful in the town.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thus We brought forth from there in who were believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So We picked out those who were in it of the faithful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then We evacuated those of the Believers who were there,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So We brought out from therein the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So We brought the believers out of that they were in.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We evacuated all the believers who were in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:35] So We brought forth those in them, that is, [in] the towns of the people of Lot, who were believers, in order to destroy the disbelievers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (You We brought forth) from the townships of Lot's folk (such believers as were there) who believed in Allah's divine Oneness.
